member.name: CRYPT_BIT_BLOB
member.summary: The CRYPT_BIT_BLOB structure contains a set of bits represented by an array of bytes.

member.name: CRYPT_BIT_BLOB.cbData
member.summary: The number of bytes in the pbData array.

member.name: CRYPT_BIT_BLOB.pbData
member.summary: A pointer to an array of bytes that represents the bits.

member.name: CRYPT_BIT_BLOB.cUnusedBits
member.summary: The number of unused bits in the last byte of the array. The unused bits are always the least significant bits in the last byte of the array.
